item.title: [stx] Semester's End
item.description:
Instant

Exile any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers you control. At the beginning of the next end step, return each of them to the battlefield under its owner's control. Each of them enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it if it's a creature and an additional loyalty counter on it if it's a planeswalker.

https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2021-03-29-revealing-some-brand-new-magic-the-gathering-strixhaven-cards

item.title: [stx] Returned Pastcaller
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Cleric

Flying

When Returned Pastcaller enters the battlefield, return target Spirit, instant, or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

https://www.pcgamer.com/three-magic-the-gathering-cards-from-the-upcoming-strixhaven-set/

Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

item.title: [stx] Reduce to Memory
item.description:
Sorcery — Lesson

Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a 3/2 red and white spirit creature token.

item.title: [stx] Reconstruct History
item.description:
Sorcery

Return up to one target artifact card, up to one target enchantment card, up to one target instant card, up to one target sorcery card, and up to one target planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.

Exile Reconstruct History.

https://infinite.tcgplayer.com/article/3-Exclusive-Lorehold-Previews-from-MTG-Strixhaven/a93c80c4-c0e7-469b-80eb-b7406ea4d065

item.title: [stx] Radiant Scrollwielder
item.description:
Creature — Dwarf Cleric

Instant sorcery spells you control have lifelink.

At the beginning of your upkeep, exile and instant or sorcery card at random from your graveyard. You may cast it this turn. If a spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

https://www.pcgamer.com/three-magic-the-gathering-cards-from-the-upcoming-strixhaven-set/

item.title: [stx] Quintorius, Field Historian
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elephant Cleric

Spirits you control get +1/+0.

Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/making-magic/strixhaven-part-1-2021-03-29

item.title: [stx] "Master of Minecraft"
item.description:
Creature — Rhino Druid

Reach

Whenever a creature you control with power equal to its toughness attacks, it gains trample until end of turn.

item.title: [stx] Lorehold Pledgemage
item.description:
Creature — Kor Shaman

First strike

Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Lorehold Pledgemage gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/making-magic/strixhaven-part-1-2021-03-29

item.title: [stx] Lorehold Excavation
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of your end step, mill a card. If a land card was milled this way, you gain 1 life. Otherwise, Lorehold Excavation deals 1 damage to each opponent. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

{5}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a tapped 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ahb1zHr75LM

item.title: [stx] Lorehold Campus
item.description:
Land

Lorehold Campus enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

{4}, {T}: Scry 1.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/making-magic/strixhaven-part-1-2021-03-29

item.title: [stx] Illustrious Historian
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

item.title: [stx] Illuminate History
item.description:
Sorcery — Lesson

Discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards. Then if there are seven or more cards in your graveyard, create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/making-magic/strixhaven-part-1-2021-03-29

item.title: [stx] Hofri Ghostforge
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dwarf Cleric

Spirits you control get +1/+1 and have trample and haste.

Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, exile it. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's a Spirit in addition to its other types and it has "When this creature leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to your graveyard."

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sl2Yn2yFRMA

item.title: [stx] Heated Debate
item.description:
Instant

This spell can't be countered. (This includes by the ward ability.)

Heated Debate deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

item.description:

item.title: [stx] Curate
item.description:

Look at the top two cards of your library. Put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest back on top of your library in any order.

item.title: [stx] Academic Probation
item.description:
Sorcery — Lesson

Choose one —

• Choose a nonland card name. Opponents can't cast spells with the chosen name until your next turn.

• Choose target nonland permanent. Until your next turn, it can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

item.title: [stx] Codie, Vociferous Codex
item.description:
Legendary Artifact Creature — Construct

You can't cast permanent spells.

{4}, {T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. When you cast your next spell this turn, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile an instant or sorcery card with lesser mana value. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put each other card exiled this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.

https://twitter.com/Deathsie/status/1376746353414537216

Flying

item.title: [stx] "Nightmare's Beverage"
item.description:
Instant

You gain 2 life. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.

item.title: [stx] Venerable Warsinger
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Cleric

Vigilance, trample

Whenever Venerable Warsinger deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the amount of damage that Venerable Warsinger dealt to that player.

https://www.kotaku.com.au/2021/03/mtg-strixhaven-preview-new-spells/

item.title: [stx] Elite Spellbinder
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

Flying

When Elite Spellbinder enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand. You may exile a nonland card from it. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may play it. A spell cast this way costs {2} more to cast.

item.description:
Sorcery

• Rip apart deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

item.title: [sta] Approach of the Second Sun
item.description:
Sorcery

If this spell was cast from your hand and you've cast another spell named Approach of the Second Sun this game, you win the game. Otherwise, put Approach of the Second Sun into its owner's library seventh from the top and you gain 7 life.

item.title: [sta] Divine Gambit
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile target artifact, creature, or enchantment an opponent controls. That player may put a permanent card from their hand onto the battlefield.

item.title: [sta] Defiant Strike
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

Draw a card.

item.title: [sta] Day of Judgment
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy all creatures.

item.title: [sta] Teferi's Protection
item.description:
Instant

Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you gain protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.)

Exile Teferi's Protection.

item.title: [sta] Revitalize
item.description:
Instant

You gain 3 life.

Draw a card.

item.title: [sta] Mana Tithe
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

item.title: [sta] Gods Willing
item.description:
Instant

Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color.)

Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

item.title: [sta] Gift of Estates
item.description:
Sorcery

If an opponent controls more lands than you, search your library for up to three Plains cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

item.title: [sta] Ephemerate
item.description:
Instant

Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

item.title: [sta] Blue Sun's Zenith
item.description:
Instant

Target player draws X cards. Shuffle Blue Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.
